attributes.action: Deport Arsene Wenger with Immediate Effect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
